content: pattern is for a semi-circle crochet shawl it perfectly drapes around your neck and shoulders and is an easy relaxing pattern using basic stitches the half circle shape of this crochet shawl is very versatile and the open lace stitches makes the design light and easy to wear crocheted from the top down with an easy to remember increase sequence handy printable stitch count chart included to keep you on track picture tutorial included for the first 8 row **materials** 4mm crochet hook you can use 700 - 800m of any fingering weight yarn or yarn weight of your choice and matching hook **measurements** shawl pictured measures 66in 168cm on the longest length and 30in 76cm depth after a light blocking
